milestone_2.failure_flavor: Ignition error. The prototype crashes in a remote field.

milestone_3.name: Orbital Satellite Deployment
milestone_3.description: A functioning satellite is launched into Earth’s orbit, transmitting data home.
milestone_3.success_flavor: Signal acquired. The satellite circles above, watching.
milestone_3.failure_flavor: Trajectory miscalculated. The satellite burns up in the atmosphere.

milestone_4.name: Animal in Orbit
milestone_4.description: A biological lifeform is launched and survives orbital flight.
milestone_4.success_flavor: Telemetry confirms survival. Humanity is one step closer.
milestone_4.failure_flavor: The capsule returns lifeless. Engineering is blamed. Quiet mourning follows.

milestone_5.name: Manned Orbital Flight
milestone_5.description: A human astronaut is launched, orbits Earth, and returns safely.
milestone_5.success_flavor: He lived. And he saw the world from the stars.
milestone_5.failure_flavor: Parachute failure — silence from reentry. Tragedy shakes the program.

milestone_6.name: EVA Suit Test
milestone_6.description: Design and trial of suits capable of surviving direct exposure to space.
milestone_6.success_flavor: The suit held. A figure floated above Earth — tethered only by cable and courage.
milestone_6.failure_flavor: Seal breach during vacuum test. Revisions ordered, silence kept.

milestone_7.name: Lunar Probe Deployment
milestone_7.description: A robotic probe reaches the Moon and transmits surface data.
milestone_7.success_flavor: The probe lives. It sees rock and shadow — and speaks across the void.
milestone_7.failure_flavor: No response. The Moon remains untouched, indifferent.

milestone_8.name: Lunar Orbital Test
milestone_8.description: A vehicle successfully enters and exits lunar orbit.
milestone_8.success_flavor: Captured by the Moon’s pull, then flung back home. The corridor is real.
milestone_8.failure_flavor: Loss of trajectory. The capsule drifts into deep space.

milestone_9.name: Lunar Landing Initiative
milestone_9.description: Landing craft, propulsion, and trajectory models are combined for human deployment.
milestone_9.success_flavor: A single boot touches lunar dust. History is etched in silence.
milestone_9.failure_flavor: Landing thrusters fail. The crater becomes a tomb.

flavor_messages.start: Dr. Cortez has accepted the assignment. He warns: 'Keep the politicians away from the math.'
progress: Cortez mutters about uranium purity and screams at interns.
Progress is steady. 'The numbers are smiling today,' he says.
flavor_messages.failure: 'I told you the yield was unstable.'

flavor_messages.start: Nomura arrives with her notes and her conditions.
progress: Ayaka reports minimal drift in trajectory simulations.
'I need better gyros, not better excuses.'
flavor_messages.success: The capsule entered orbit. Nomura doesn’t smile, she nods.

flavor_messages.start: Vortmeyer arrives in a tailored trench coat. 'Progress is inevitable. Morality is negotiable.'
progress: 'This reminds me of Peenemünde — only with less oversight.'
Klaus laughs alone in the lab, muttering about payload-to-orbit ratios.
flavor_messages.success: 'It performed exactly as modeled. I was never in doubt.'
flavor_messages.failure: 'Detonation misfire? Then your engineers failed me, not the design.'

flavor_messages.start: 'I build things to touch the stars. Don’t hand me a wrench without reverence.'
progress: 'Telemetry is holding. Trajectory is beautiful. I could cry.'
Velasquez scribbles equations on the walls again. She's close to something.
flavor_messages.success: 'There it is. Orbit achieved. I want everyone on this team promoted.'
flavor_messages.failure: 'They blamed me when the stage detached early. But I designed it to *burn*, not *fail*.'

expand_network.description: Deploy operatives to expand your spy network in {country}.

monitor_project.description: Uncover the current national project activity in {country}, focusing on {project}.

sabotage_industry.description: Disrupt {country}'s industrial sectors to hamper their growth.

sway_ideology.description: Promote {ideology} ideals within {country} through covert influence.

incite_unrest.description: Trigger unrest within {country} to destabilize their government.

assassination.description: Dispense with {leader} immediately! Their influence cannot be allowed to persist in {country}!
